commit message:
New status icon

The new icon resembles launcher icon and follows material design
guidelines, see

https://www.google.com/design/spec/style/icons.html#icons-system-icons

Merge pull request #335 from relan/status-icon

New status icon
bump versionCode to allow patch releases
use a fixed height for the seek bar (fixes layout issues on Android 6)

pass full URI to mime guesser
fixes https://github.com/vanilla-music/vanilla/issues/343
show queue is (again) a swipe option

send stock broadcasts by default
Fixes https://github.com/vanilla-music/vanilla/issues/311

force-recreating views if DISPLAY_MODE changes
Hopefully fully fixes https://github.com/vanilla-music/vanilla/issues/331
